input.prompt:
{ "PRODNAME": "Mama Koala One Size Baby Washable Reusable Pocket Cloth Diapers, 6 Pack with 6 One Size Microfiber Inserts (Jagger)", "BRANDNAME": "Mama Koala", "COLOR": "Jagger", "DESCRIPTION": "Product Details

Mama Koala cloth diaper is a one-size pocket diaper that fits most babies 8-35lbs. The diaper has an outer layer of breathable, waterproof thermoplastic polyurethane(TPU) to keep wetness in, and an inner layer of high quality suede cloth that wicks moisture away from baby's delicate skin, and provides a trim fit.

Included 6 FREE adjustable inserts made of 3 layers of thirsty microfiber.

Wash and Care

Shake off poop into the toilet.
Put wet or soiled diapers in a dry pail.
Pre-wash with cold water and no detergent.
Do a regular wash in hot water (40C/104F max) with detergent.
Rinse warm twice.
Tumble dry low.
No bleach. No fabric softener.

Tips:
Wash diapers and inserts prior to first use.
We recommend washing every 1-2 days.
Change baby's diaper every 2-3 hours.", "BULLETS": "NO LEAKS - Waterproof and breathable TPU outer, super soft and stay dry suede cloth inner protects baby from moisture GROWS WITH YOUR CHILD - One size (8-35lbs) with 3x3 rise snaps to customize for the perfect fit SAVE MONEY AND REDUCE WASTE - one size cloth diapers and inserts are simple, economical and eco-friendly ULTRA ABSORBENT - Your order includes 6 one-size 3-layer microfiber inserts. They are light weight yet highly absorbent. The inserts with snaps or folds are shipped randomly. Designation or exchange services are not available. MANUFACTURER PROMISE - Quality guarantee and 5-star customer service. If you are not 100% completely satisfied, give us a call or email us and we'll make it right. All returned items in good condition will be donated.", }

segment_1 = ( "

About Mama Koala One Size Baby Washable Reusable Pocket Cloth Diapers, 6 Pack with 6 One Size Microfiber Inserts (Jagger)

", "

The Mama Koala One Size Baby Washable Reusable Pocket Cloth Diapers, 6 Pack with 6 One Size Microfiber Inserts (Jagger) is a cloth diaper set designed by Mama Koala. These reusable pocket diapers are crafted to fit babies weighing between 8 and 35 pounds. Each pack contains six diapers alongside six adjustable inserts made from microfiber, intended to provide absorbency within a single washable format.

" ) segment_2 = ( "

Characteristics for Usage

", "

The diapers feature a waterproof and breathable thermoplastic polyurethane outer layer combined with a suede cloth inner layer to manage moisture and provide a trim fit. " ) segment_3 = ( "

Flavour Profile

", "

Jagger

" ) segment_5 = ( "

", "

This product falls under the reusable cloth diaper category and is available in the Jagger colour. It includes six diapers and six microfiber inserts, designed to fit babies from 8 to 35 pounds. The Mama Koala brand manufactures this set, which features adjustable sizing and materials aimed at moisture management.

" ) segment_short = ( "

Brand Overview

", "

Mama Koala offers cloth diaper solutions that focus on adjustability and materials such as TPU and suede cloth to provide moisture control and fit. The brand provides multi-pack cloth diaper sets with accompanying inserts designed for repeated use and fit versatility.

" )

input.prompt:
{ "PRODNAME": "Spy Camera - Hidden Camera - USB Charger - Hidden Camera Charger - USB Charger Camera - Surveillance Camera - Hidden Spy Camera - Hidden Nanny Cam - Full HD 1080p", "BRANDNAME": "LEXPERT", "COLOR": "Black", "DESCRIPTION": "

✅MAIN FEATURES

  • Easy and simple. You plug it in, and it’ll record.
  • High-Definition: Full 1080p high definition (1920x1080).
  • Undetectable. Recording without indicator light.
  • Universal charger: It will charge most of devices including iPhone, Android phone, iPad, tablets, etc.
  • Simple: Plug in, watch later.
  • Storage: Support micro SD card up to 128GB GB (card not included).
  • 1-Year Warranty
  • **Note: No sound recording. Under US law, trading, owning, and using of concealed voice recording is prohibited.

 

✅WHAT ARE INCLUDED

  • 1 Lexpert Camera and Charger
  • 1 User Guide
  • 1 Male-to-Male USB Cord

✅BONUS

  • 1 Lexpert Camera and Charger
  • 1 User Guide with Plain English Instruction and Screenshots
  • 1 Male-to-Male USB Cord

 

✅SPECIFICATIONS

  • Video Format: AVI
  • Video Code: M-JPEG
  • Resolution: FULL HD 1080P 1920 x 1080 p
  • Frame Rate: 30fps
  • Video Proportion: 16:9
  • Motion Detection: Support
  • Loop Recording: Support
  • Output Voltage: DC-5V
  • USB Speed: 2.0
  • Storage Support: Micro SD card up to 32GB (not included)
  • Support system: Windows me/2000/XP/2003 Vista; Mac OS; Linux

It helps you keep an eye on your unfaithful partner, children, landlord, lodger, roommate, babysitters, nannies, caregivers, elderly parents, or employees at home, bedroom, hotel, hostel, work, office, hospital or anywhere else. ✅ ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY - IQ Motion Detection with 130 points, can detect slightest movement. Support micro SD card up to 128 GB Class 10 (not included). It can record continuously or motion activated with crystal-clear video and without too much heat or damage your SD card. ✅ EASY TO USE - Just plug in a outlet or a power bank, the camera will automatically record. If you plug in a power bank, you can put anywhere on any direction to get a perfect view you want. No need to setup, no Wi-Fi, no need any app. It is simple. ✅ PREMIUM QUALITY - With 24/7 customer support from our Lexpert's professional tech support team based in Texas. So why wait? Click Buy Now!", }

The camera automatically records when plugged into a power source, requiring no additional setup or Wi-Fi connection.

", "

", "

input.prompt:
{
    "PRODNAME": "FYY Case for iPhone 7/8/SE 2020, Luxury PU Leather Wallet Phone Case with Card Holder Flip Cover for iPhone 7/iPhone 8/iPhone SE 2020 (2nd Gen) 4.7 inch - Rose Gold",
    "BRANDNAME": "FYY",
    "COLOR": "A-Rose Gold",
    "DESCRIPTION": "Wallet phone case for iPhone 7/8/SE 2020 4.7", built with card holder and note pocket, provide hand-free while on the on. Kickstand feature is convenient for movie watching and chatting.",
    "BULLETS": "Unique RFID Blocking Technique: Radio Frequency Identification technology, through radio signals to identify specific targets and to read and copy electronic data. Most Credit Cards, Debit Cards, ID Cards are set-in the RFID chip, the RFID reader can easily read the cards information within 10 feet(about 3m) without touching them. This case is designed to protect your cards information from stealing with blocking material of RFID shielding technology.
Specifically for iPhone 8 2017/iPhone 7 2016/iPhone SE(2nd) 2020 4.7". Top quality iPhone 7/8/SE 2020 flip phone case made with Luxury PU Leather. 100% Handmade
Large Capacity. iPhone 7/8/SE 2020 leather wallet case with Card Holders and Note Holder provide you to put debit card, credit card, ID card, receipts or some change while on the go
Multiple Functions. Kickstand function is convenient for movie-watching or video-chatting. Easy access to all ports and controls
One-year quality support. If you have any quality issue with our case, please feel free to contact our customer service",
}
